title: Weekly Wrap: "It Is Written."
description: Sam esta bailando with Pop Culture Happy Hour host Linda Holmes (@lindaholmes) and NPR Politics Podcast host and congressional correspondent Scott Detrow (@scottdetrow). Catch up on the week's news: the World Cup, Trump administration immigration policy, and diversity in film criticism.  Email the show at samsanders@npr.org and tweet @NPRItsBeenAMin with feels.
